title: JSON schema for NPM package.json files

dependency.description: Dependencies are specified with a simple hash of package name to version range. The version range is a string which has one or more space-separated descriptors. Dependencies can also be identified with a tarball or git URL.

osDependency.description: Used to specify dependency in different os.

win32.description: The dependency in win32, specified with a simple hash of package name to version range. The version range is a string which has one or more space-separated descriptors. Dependencies can also be identified with a tarball or git URL.

linux.description: The dependency in linux, specified with a simple hash of package name to version range. The version range is a string which has one or more space-separated descriptors. Dependencies can also be identified with a tarball or git URL.

darwin.description: The dependency in darwin, specified with a simple hash of package name to version range. The version range is a string which has one or more space-separated descriptors. Dependencies can also be identified with a tarball or git URL.

repo.description: The repo uri for pre-commit plugin. see https://pre-commit.com/hooks.html

rev.description: The revision of the repo, see https://pre-commit.com/hooks.html

hooks.description: The hooks provided by the repo, see https://pre-commit.com/hooks.html

gitHook.description: The git hooks, support commit-msg, pre-commit

type.description: The hook type, regexp for regular expression

tips.description: The tips to show when the commit-msg test failed, used array to show multi-line.

type.description: The pre-commit hook type, 'pre-commit' for the python pre-commit which would generate '.pre-commit-config.yaml'

repos.description: The repos config used to generate '.pre-commit-config.yaml'
